name: Tic-Tac-Toe (temutemugames)
description:
temutemugames brings to you the classic, arcade amusement of Tic-Tac-Toe!

Grab a friend and play as X's or O's, and enjoy (kind of) endless hours of entertainment!

Hope you have a great time with it. The game was made in a couple spare hours, in GameMaker Studio (Legacy).

Thanks for playing, enjoy!
